overview: Trans of Thought is centered around the dynamic between a Trans identifying woman and a Cis lesbian identifying woman. They decided to go on a simple date, but all isn't so simple when the topic of disclosure is presented to both women. Through the eyes of both of the main characters, we get a first hand look at the ways in which dating, disclosure and gender identification are navigated. While also shedding light on the prevalent disconnect between members of the LGBTQ community.
tagline: Find the courage to be yourself
title: Trans of Thought
